article.title: Two Firms to Provide Joint Tactical Radio Distribution System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ViaSat, Carlsbad, California, is being awarded a $31,467,541 firm-fixed-price delivery order for Multifunctional Information Distribution System Joint Tactical Radio Systems. Data Link Solutions, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $25,766,055 firm-fixed-price delivery order. The Space and Naval Warfare Systems Command, San Diego, California, is the contracting activity.
